programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Čarodejnica: Hana a Robo sa presťahovali na vidiek po narodení dcéry. Hana si však na nový spôsob život nezvykla, často chodí do mesta. O Robovi sa po dedine povráva, že si našiel milenku. Hana chce zistiť pravdu, požiada o pomoc susedku, o ktorej sa vraví, že je čarodejnica...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Babička vie najlepšie: Mladomanželia Petra a Samo krátko po svadbe zistili, že budú mať potomka. Tento moment ich prekvapil, a preto privítali pomoc od Samovej matky Zuzany. Tá sa situácie chopila s vervou a začala riešiť nielen ich bývanie, ale po narodení aj výchovu syna. Petra pomoc najprv uvítala, napokon lekár jej diagnostikoval popôrodnú depresiu. Časom však zistila, že problém je niekde inde...

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Na telo
programme.desc: Moderátor Michal Kovačič privíta každú nedeľu atraktívnych hostí z radov politikov v diskusii na aktuálne témy, ktoré hýbu Slovenskom.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ágostonove „krštiny“: Františkova mama sa prišla sťažovať na Zuzaninu mamu - nedá sa to s ňou vydržať a hrozí fyzické násilie. František s Lászlom sa nevzdávajú a napriek nezáujmu Milky a Gergelyho im chcú kúpiť spoločne byt. Ildikó ani Zuzane sa to nepáči. Ildikó je sústredená na krštiny Ágostona - Františka. Ale ak nie je všetko podľa nej, vyhráža sa ich zrušením. Zuzana s Andrejkou v teleshopingu propagujú “Vibrotic muscle” a pridá sa aj Zuzanina mama, ktorá sa príde sťažovať na tú Františkovu. Ako dopadnú krštiny, keď psychicky rozhodená Zuzana má na starosti zohnať sviečku aj košieľku? Podarí sa susedom uzmieriť po vzájomných výčitkách? Aký je vlastne vzťah Zuzaninej a Františkovej mamy? A prečo odrazu Františkovi záleží na Lászlovej životospráve?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Vianoce: Zuzana chce konečne trochu pokoja, Vianoce budú s Františkom oslavovať len v úzkom kruhu rodiny a on to musí oznámiť Lászlovi. Milka dostala od "debilových" mamičiek ako odškodné vianočný zájazd do Thajska. Ak chce František osláviť Štedrý večer so svojím vnukom, musia si Vianoce urobiť hneď. Ani Komáromovci nebudú na Štedrý večer doma. Ildikó dostala od kolegov welness pobyt. Lászlo napriek tomu hrá urazeného, že Fero nezabojoval so Zuzanou, aby mohli byť na Vianoce spolu. František má preto veľké výčitky, ale všetko sa prezradí a nakoniec sa po roztržke kamaráti opäť zmieria. Lászlo dokonca pomôže Františkovi pripraviť naozajstnú vianočnú oslavu so stromčekom aj s kaprom. Podarí sa Lászlovi s Ildikó odcestovať na wellness pobyt? Koľko ľudí sa nakoniec zúčastní na Františkových predčasných Vianociach, ktoré boli plánované pre najužšiu rodinu?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Syn a vnuk: László túži po ťuťu-muťu, veď šestonedelie Ildikó už dávno skončilo, ale ona nič. František tiež prežíva manželskú krízu. Nepáči sa mu, že Zuzana celé dni sedí doma v nátačkách a župane. Fero má šťastie. Hoci býva nakrúcanie teleshopingu iba raz do týždňa, dnes bude mimoriadne navyše. Zuzanu a Andrejku pri prezliekaní prekvapí poštár, ktorý ignoruje, že reštaurácia sa zmenila na štúdio. Z pohľadu na vyzlečené baby má šok. V parku František flirtuje s mladými mamičkami. Tvrdí im že Evan je jeho syn. László naopak Ágostona predstavuje ako svojho vnuka, lebo sa hanbí. Keď si dcéra pani Jarmilky udrie kolienko, František jej ponúkne ošetrenie u seba v byte. Zuzana ich pristihne v momente, keď tvrdí, že sa rozvádza, lebo jeho manželka má milenca. Navyše Evan v parku nájde mŕtvolu, ktorú ho László v panike nechá strážiť. Ako vysvetlí František Zuzane návštevu atraktívnej mamičky? Ako dopadne László, keď sa informácia, že kočíkuje vnuka dostane k Ildikó?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Maliar. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Erika dostane ponuku stáť ako model slávnemu maliarovi. Ďuro sa tomu snaží zabrániť zo všetkých síl.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Noha. Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Do Hornej Dolnej dorazia pozostatky slávneho rodáka - vynálezcu Jozefa Čorblíka. Pre dedinu je to veľká udalosť. Jediný, kto sa neteší, je starosta...

programme.title: Sestričky IV
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Jana, ktorá našla schovaný mobil začína mať podozrenie, že Tomáš ho má kvôli tomu, aby utajil milenecký pomer. Všetky dôkazy jej to potvrdzujú. Jana je z toho nesvoja, bola presvedčená, že ich vzťah je lepší než predtým. Táňa sa stále vyhýba potrebným vyšetreniam a tají to nielen pred Petrom, ale aj pred ostatnými. Na oddelení sa objaví prípad mladého Róma, ktorý otvorí tému rasovej diskriminácie. Ema priamo v sanitke musí pomôcť tehotnej žene pri pôrode, pri ktorom sa s Adamom zbližujú. Helene súdny zákaz približovania sa k Oliverovi, začína komplikovať prácu. Cíti sa kvôli tomu trápne, a tak sa to snaží obísť, ale to sa jej nevyplatí...

programme.title: Sestričky IV
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Helena sa začína v nemocnici cítiť nekomfortne. Riaditeľova sekretárka o nej šíri škaredé klebety, primárka Marta sa snaží zistiť, aká je pravda. Medzi Janou a Helenou to začína iskriť, Jana sa otvorene stavia na Oliverovu stranu. Ema sa „zabudne“ pri zábavnom rozhovore s Adamom kvôli čomu zažije šok, že sa jej stratil syn. Táňa sa podrobí vyšetreniu, ale odmieta operáciu. Stará sa o pacientku, ktorá je úspešná a vzdelaná žena a napriek tomu zapiera závažné ochorenie. Táňa sa jej snaží pomôcť a pritom sa rozhodne, že na operáciu pôjde, ale neskôr, aby neublížila dieťaťu. To sa však zmení, keď nečakane odpadne.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Chlapec z dobrej rodiny: Tridsiatnik Henrich si našiel priateľku, do ktorej sa úprimne zaľúbil. Letuška Naďa však nezodpovedá predstavám Henrichovej matky, ktorá chce dať syna dokopy s právničkou Beátou. Oproti Nadi je dostatočne na úrovni, a teda hodná jej syna...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Rodinný biznis: Bratia Andrej a Paľo majú malú firmu. Kým Andrej je človek so silným zmyslom pre spravodlivosť, brat je jeho charakterový opak - neštíti sa robiť kompromisy so svedomím. Firme sa prestane dariť a obaja bratia chcú riešiť situáciu po svojom...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Žena z minulosti: Mladý pár Aneta a Karol majú všetko, čo by im iní závideli - tešia sa dobrému zdraviu, majú slušne platenú prácu i vlastné bývanie. Na prvý pohľad ideálny vzťah má však trhliny. Obaja majú iný názor na vlastné deti. Navyše Anetu po čase vyhľadá neznáma žena...

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Ruža pre nevestu II
programme.sub-title: Romantická zoznamovacia šou
programme.desc: Romantická zoznamovacia reality šou Ruža pre nevestu prichádza s 2. sériou! Na ceste plnej dobrodružstva, exotiky, vzrušujúcich stretnutí, emócií, ale aj intríg stretne príťažlivý a úspešný 34-ročný podnikateľ Radko Urbanyak celkovo 18 žien, s ktorými sa bude v priebehu 12 epizód postupne zoznamovať, zbližovať a vyberať si z nich svoju potenciálnu životnú partnerku. Každá z nich je výraznou individualitou, ktorá sa usiluje vytvoriť si svoj vlastný príbeh lásky s Radkom v hlavnej úlohe. Avšak na konci v dramatickom a emotívnom finále zostane už iba jedna žena. Prijme napokon jeho poslednú ružu a stane sa z nich skutočný, láskou naplnený pár? Moderuje Krištof Králik.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Dozvuky Balatonu: Kvôli nešťastnej dovolenke je vzťah susedov v kríze. László a František sa nerozprávajú. Marta už mesiac odkladá oslavu svojich menín, aby ich oslávili spoločne. Dá im ultimátum, ak sa neudobria prestane sa s nimi rozprávať aj ona. Dokážu Susedia prekonať svoje rozpory? Nájde sa ukradnuté Františkovo auto?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Tak kto je teda otec?!: Milka sa vrátila domov. František musí spávať na gauči v obývačke. Zuzana je rozhodnutá všetko usporiadať ako sa patrí. Treba nájsť otca očakávaného dieťaťa. Lenže Milka odmieta, a vie že jej chvíľková slabosť bola chybou a ešte väčšou by bol sobáš s Marekom, keď sa jej vôbec nepáči.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Agent provokatér: Zuzana ďalej spriada plány ako dať dokopy Milku s Marekom. László potrebuje riešiť partnerskú krízu, myslí si, že sa Ildikó nepáči taký aký je. Na lesnej správe je podozrenie z úplatkárstva a chlapi musia pomáhať usvedčiť páchateľa. Podarí sa im zasa nepopliesť všetky problémy a úspešne obstáť v ďalšej skúške ich vzťahu?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Osy útočia: Marta celú noc žúrovala a František ani László sa veľmi nevyspali. Na balkón k Ildikó sa nasťahovali osy. Aby toho nebolo málo, Františkov otec sa stratil. Zuzana sa nevie sústrediť na predaj popolníkov s bielym medveďom, keď má Františkovu mamičku za chrbtom. Chlapi hľadajú otca a László musí riešiť aj osy na balkóne. Pomôcť by mohol Andrejkin frajer - hasič, ale Andrejka s ním má problém. Podarí sa nájsť Františkovho otca? Ako sa susedia vysporiadajú s osami? A ako to dopadne s Andrejkiným vzťahom?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Gergely sa vracia: Syn Gergely volá Ildikó, že príde domov na návštevu. Andrejka sa chce kvôli novému frajerovi naučiť nejaké maďarské slovíčka. Zuzana je pozvaná na otvorenie nového kasína. Darčekový žetón pripomenie Františkovi Zuzaninu hráčsku závislosť a dá ho radšej Lászlovi. Ten však musí všetko utajiť pred Ildikó, ktorá neznáša hazard. Vyhrá László v kasíne veľké peniaze? Kto je Andrejkin maďarský rocker a kto Gergelyova nová frajerka letuška? A ako sa so všetkým vyrovná Ildikó?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Veľká noc. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Opäť je tu Veľká noc a ženy majú podozrenie, že ich zase čaká masaker. A hoci muži prisahajú, že nemajú žiadne zlé úmysly, ženy sa pripravujú na boj…

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Oblievačka. Komediálny seriál SR (2016).
programme.desc: Muži v Hornej Dolnej majú strach! Ženy sa im chcú pomstiť za všetky veľkonočné príkoria.

programme.title: Prezident 2024: Volebná noc
programme.desc: Sledujte volebnú noc k 2. kolu voľby prezidenta SR 2024 na Markíze, ktorá bude obohatená o množstvo inovatívnych a divácky atraktívnych prvkov vrátane využitia virtuálnej reality. Z volebných centrál prinesieme naživo prvé reakcie kandidátov a emócie ich podporovateľov.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Drahá vstupenka: Fero má cez tridsať, ľudia z dediny ho poznajú ako starého mládenca a čudáka. Jedného dňa prišiel za ním kamarát z mesta Juro s netradičným nápadom na privyrobenie. Za účelové manželstvo s dievčaťom z Ukrajiny Ferovi ponúkol slušný balík peňazí, a ten povedal áno. To však ešte netušil, čo ho všetko čaká...

programme.desc: Whatever It Takes. Hope tries to save an injured fawn.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (5)
programme.desc: The New Hope. Typical animal behaviours are thrown off due to the mild winter; Zak tends to an injured bald eagle.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (1)
programme.desc: Chunk the Seal. Students from the Atlantic Veterinary College visit Hope's animal rehab facility for some hands-on experience in treating a harbor seal.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (1)
programme.desc: Madagascar. Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth; when these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange, from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (2)
programme.desc: Australia. Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse; the beach turns into a dueling ground and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (3)
programme.desc: Savannah. The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it's head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (4)
programme.desc: India. Welcome to India - a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare; monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests (5)
programme.desc: Boreal. The presenter showcases a diverse group of species inhabiting the rainforests, including a solitary sloth cultivating a mini-forest, lemurs sharing equally, elephants tending their forests and more.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests (6)
programme.desc: Wildlife. The presenter showcases a diverse group of species inhabiting the rainforests, including a solitary sloth cultivating a mini-forest, lemurs sharing equally, elephants tending their forests and more.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia (1)
programme.desc: Tropical Shores. Host Lizze Daly explores the coast of Australia and visits the surrounding seas, where she encounters diverse marine creatures and meets the people protecting them.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests (5)
programme.desc: Boreal. The presenter showcases a diverse group of species inhabiting the rainforests, including a solitary sloth cultivating a mini-forest, lemurs sharing equally, elephants tending their forests and more.

programme.title: Wild Fighters (1)
programme.desc: The Fight for Life. Investigating the different reasons that lead animals to face tough disputes.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: A trek across Africa to peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals; from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan (2)
programme.sub-title: Lean on Me
programme.desc: Lean on Me

programme.title: Animal Einsteins (1)
programme.desc: Masterminds. Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brainpower; he explores how different animals, such as ravens, crows, bees and starlings, can use tools and solve complex puzzles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (1)
programme.desc: Weatherproof. Steering clear of alphas, whose horns, claws and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out; examining killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (2)
programme.desc: Agile. A male brown hare throws punches at his beloved; admiring a sandhill crane dance battle; ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season; why leopards are stealth masters.

No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valentine's Bean. Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: All You Can Eat. Mr Bean has forgotten he's supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Flat Pack. Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Holiday Teddy. Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: What if Tom and Jerry were born in Asia? Follow the new adventures of Tom and Jerry as they feast, play and create mayhem Asia! From food, culture, history and places of interests, get ready for double trouble!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Takers Keepers
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Birthdays. The bugs talk about birthdays.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Life's Not A Breeze! While feeding the Cutie-Twees, Twee Dum accidentally swallows some “ballooney berries.” As a result, he floats skyward, giving the Breeze-Twee an opportunity to escape! While Lewis gets busy gathering the ingredients for Twee Dum’s antidote, Alice offers to head off with Twee Di to fetch back the escaped Cutie-Twee.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Super-Cutie-Twee. When Alice arrives in Wonderland, she finds Lewis and the Twins captivated by a Cutie-Twee with puppy dog eyes. Wise to its tricks, realizing it’s using its charms to get pampered, Alice goes out of her way to get her friends to see through the Cutie-Twee’s little game. But then the Queen comes along and snatches away the adorable little critter, adopting it as her own personal pet, locked away in the castle!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: A Kick in the Butler. A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butler's Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy. But never fear, Tom will step into the ring and defend Cate's title.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Robot. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ice Cream. Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Moley: Squirm & Manny
programme.desc: Outside of Moletown, and far from the gazes of Moley and the Gardener, Squirm and Manny are best of friends, join them on their own hilarious mini adventures with this series of short animations as they experience Art, Gardening, travel, nature, dancing and so much more!

programme.sub-title: A Turtle Named Mrytle
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.sub-title: There's Nothing Like a Good Book
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part I. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: A Snootful. The Lady of the House's cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesn't catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Lame Duck. Ginger and Rick have installed a new birdbath, and Little Quacker has taken up residence in it. Ginger forbids Tom from going out in the back and has Rick move Spike's house. The dog and cat soon unite to return Little Quacker to the pond without Ginger finding out they're responsible for sending him packing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: It's All Relative. When Jerry's country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Vegged Out. Jerry discovers the mysterious phobia cats have toward cucumbers and is inspired to try it out on Tom. After freaking Tom out repeatedly, Butch steps in to counsel Tom and help him overcome his fear, only Butch is far from immune himself. The two encounter more and more trouble as they deal with their phobia.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Lost Marbles. A dim-witted cat walks into the detective agency asking for help. It seems he has lost his marbles: He's the city's champion marble player and has either misplaced his case of lucky marbles, or it's been stolen. The cat is desperate to find them before the big tournament. It's up to Tom and Jerry to retrace the cat's steps and solve this mystery.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Frown and Country. Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerry's mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriend's friend for a double date.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Vocal Yokel. Little Quacker develops the ability to sing like Pavarotti. But when Tom plots to use this to win a prize on the "Pets With Talent" TV show, Little Quacker refuses and Jerry covers for him. As things continue to snowball, it's up to Tom to attempt saving the day.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Family. The bugs talk about their families.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Day Star. It’s the Night of the Stars in Wonderland and Lewis invites Alice to see the show. Afterwards, our two friends make an unexpected encounter in the garden: they find a little star that’s eager to see daytime! Alice is only too happy to help it fulfill its dream. But when it starts gradually losing its star dust, they realize there’s a risk it might not be able to rise back into the sky to shine once again alongside its relatives. Alice and Lewis must prevent that danger from occurring, ASAP! And so off they head to the Valley of the Night!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Tooth the Rescue! When one of Lewis’ teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Journey to the Moon. While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Mighty Mike

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Green Bean. Mr Bean’s electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Bean’s flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Bean’s wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Cash Machine. Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Bean's bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Litterbug. Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Rat Trap. Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: What if Tom and Jerry were born in Asia? Follow the new adventures of Tom and Jerry as they feast, play and create mayhem Asia! From food, culture, history and places of interests, get ready for double trouble!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Favourite Things. The bugs talk about some of their favourite things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Olymp-Easter Games. It’s D-Day for the Olymp-Easter Games, a sports competition organized by the King every year, pitting the Queen and Dinah against each other in a battle to the last! This year, however, to lighten things up a bit, the King has decided to rethink the tournament and instead put the Queen and her niece on the same team, along with Alice and Lewis. Our little friends are going to have to rise above the tensions that reign between their two royal teammates in order to take on their formidable opponents – the Frostaland Penguins!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Useless Queen. Inconvenienced by the Cuddly Cacti, the Queen decides to flush them out of her yard! To achieve this, she comes up with a special device (in the form of an hourglass) designed to banish any individual who is of no use to the kingdom. Unfortunately for her, the royal hourglass points not to the cacti but to the Queen! With Alice and Lewis’ help, the monarch must now go about proving her worth before a certain deadline, failing which she will be exiled from Wonderland!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.sub-title: Cave Cat. A prehistoric Cave Cat arrives at Rick and Ginger's house.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A Round of Golf. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Superhero Bean. A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wicket’s house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: What a load of Rubbish. Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Moley: Squirm & Manny
programme.desc: Outside of Moletown, and far from the gazes of Moley and the Gardener, Squirm and Manny are best of friends, join them on their own hilarious mini adventures with this series of short animations as they experience Art, Gardening, travel, nature, dancing and so much more!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.sub-title: Wrong!
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.sub-title: Win Lose or Daffy
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Life's Not A Breeze! While feeding the Cutie-Twees, Twee Dum accidentally swallows some “ballooney berries.” As a result, he floats skyward, giving the Breeze-Twee an opportunity to escape! While Lewis gets busy gathering the ingredients for Twee Dum’s antidote, Alice offers to head off with Twee Di to fetch back the escaped Cutie-Twee.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Super-Cutie-Twee. When Alice arrives in Wonderland, she finds Lewis and the Twins captivated by a Cutie-Twee with puppy dog eyes. Wise to its tricks, realizing it’s using its charms to get pampered, Alice goes out of her way to get her friends to see through the Cutie-Twee’s little game. But then the Queen comes along and snatches away the adorable little critter, adopting it as her own personal pet, locked away in the castle!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Cattyshack. It's time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, he's determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Home Away from Home. Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a "free" sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesn't notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that he's landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: From Riches to Rags. After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Tom's life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Chew Toy. Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Ginger's yard sale. A woman who thinks he's a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Live and Let Diet. The Lady of the Manor's prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfred's successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Tom's efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Auntie Social. When Rick and Ginger go to a couple's retreat, they leave Tom with Rick's Auntie Louella. Hearing that she's a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Life's Not A Breeze! While feeding the Cutie-Twees, Twee Dum accidentally swallows some “ballooney berries.” As a result, he floats skyward, giving the Breeze-Twee an opportunity to escape! While Lewis gets busy gathering the ingredients for Twee Dum’s antidote, Alice offers to head off with Twee Di to fetch back the escaped Cutie-Twee.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Super-Cutie-Twee. When Alice arrives in Wonderland, she finds Lewis and the Twins captivated by a Cutie-Twee with puppy dog eyes. Wise to its tricks, realizing it’s using its charms to get pampered, Alice goes out of her way to get her friends to see through the Cutie-Twee’s little game. But then the Queen comes along and snatches away the adorable little critter, adopting it as her own personal pet, locked away in the castle!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.sub-title: The Magic of Spring

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About What We Find Funny. The bugs talk about things they find funny.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Listening. The bugs talk about listening.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Junkyard Pup. When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump, Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before Ace and Rocco – the junkyard guard dogs – turn him into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Where Did You Get That Cat? Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat-A-Tonic Mouse. When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouse's down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, it's an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Going Going Gone Viral. When Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerry's mouse hole, the video instantly goes viral and Tom becomes the laughing stock of the feline community. Now Tom must restore his reputation by catching Jerry and capturing it all on video. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: School of Hard Knocks. Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol' cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today they're going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Tom's house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Brain Food. Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out he's not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; they're covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dog's behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cold Snap. Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches' world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair. When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. It's up to the duo to see what's really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Wish Bone. Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks he's pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Tom's wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off
programme.desc: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Expressing Emotions. The bugs talk about expressing their emotions.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.
